solution_line_template: So for all even-numbered floors (2, 4, 6, 8, 10), it takes {num_even_floors}*{time_per_even_floor}= <<{num_even_floors}*{time_per_even_floor}={total_time_even_floors}>>{total_time_even_floors} seconds
And for all odd-numbered floors (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) it takes {num_odd_floors}*{time_per_odd_floor}= <<{num_odd_floors}*{time_per_odd_floor}={total_time_odd_floors}>>{total_time_odd_floors} seconds
To climb all the floors, it takes {total_time_even_floors}+{total_time_odd_floors}= <<{total_time_even_floors}+{total_time_odd_floors}={total_time_seconds}>>{total_time_seconds} seconds
So it takes {total_time_seconds}/{seconds_per_minute}=<<{total_time_seconds}/{seconds_per_minute}={total_time_minutes}>>{total_time_minutes} minutes to get to the 10th floor
